ygData.subject: Re: OMG!  GZ finally replied
ygData.msgSnippet: Quick note, Egg Shaped Pumice stone: 15-18 plat Contains 5 charges of NULLIFY Magic as I use these alot and my necromancer has the spell Nullify removes TWO
ygData.messageBody:
Quick note,


Egg Shaped Pumice stone: 15-18 plat
Contains 5 charges of "NULLIFY Magic" as I use these alot and my necromancer
has the spell Nullify removes TWO enchantments at a time.


The Golem Wand from cazic Thule-5 charges of "Pillage Enchantment" as I am
holding mine in reserve for when I run out of pumice stones deep in lower
guk I have not used it yet.


Also another priceless object to be gotten bu bards..

The Cazic Thule Gate Potion. Dopped by the Cenobite in the avatar of fear
room. Its suposedly the "common" drop off the cenobite the rare drop being
the rogue only raven scale boots. Although the cenibite to me the other
night RARELY EVER spawned. Just a darn justicar in his place.

I plan on having me a few gate potions on hand when I decide to live in
lower guk for a while.


Tuldar 34th bard Tarew Marr
(41st necro as msecondary character)
-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, November 10, 1999 11:18 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] OMG! GZ finally replied


>From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
>Go directly to Kizzie Mintopp. Do not pass Fiddy Binnstock. Get a pumice
>stone for 15-18pp (called an egg-shaped pumice - icon looks like light
>stone) it has 3 charges of Pillage Enchantment (strips 5 icons per charge)
>Carry in a main inv slot. When you get rooted, target self and right click
>fast on the stone to cast effect on yourself. Not sure if it will remove
>steal strength or not. I have a steel golum wand but have not had to use
it
>as i try to keep my MR up real high with a sha buff and or purifying
>rythmns.
>
>Rations... 2sp
>Dragoon Dirk... 40pp
>Ashenwood Short Spear... 100pp
>
>Egg-shaped Pumice... priceless!
>
>Sylly Songsynger
>Bard of the 35th Song
><Spirit of the Moon>
>somewhere on Innoruuk
>
>From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
>> Alenias Disenchanting Melody
>>
>> GZ: I will check this one out. It *should* cast cancel magic on
>> your entire
>> group - and did at one point of beta. It is high on my list of things to
>> check out/get fixed.
>
>Holy cow! This would have been more than just a little bit useful in
>Befallen at level 22. It would have saved me several nasty DoT deaths.
FIX
>THIS ONE! When I'm hunting (err.. dying) in Kithicor now I'd have it
memmed
>right beside Selo's. This would allow me to at least be in motion when I
>died.
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
>
